28203511.review:
Hallo liebe Steam - Nutzer!

Ich möchte euch hiermit ein kleines Review bieten, das hoffentlich dem ein oder anderen helfen wird.

1.Grafik / Audio
2.Story
3.Performance
4.Preis / Leistung

---------------------------------------
1. Grafik / Audio
Ich finde die Grafik in diesem Spiel sehr gelungen, da ich solche Cartoon-Spiele sehr mag. Auch der Startbildschirm des Spiels ist sehr cool, ebenfalls im Cartoon / Comic-Stil gehalten. Im Hintergrund hört man eine beruhigende Musik, mit dem ein oder anderen 'Plitsch - Platsch' aus Tropfsteinhöhlen oder das 'Jungelgeräusch' auf Tropen-Maps. 

2. Story
Es gibt keine richtige Story, jedoch eine Person, die Rätsel lösen muss ( Lara Croft ). Diese werden von Level zu Level erheblich schwerer, es ist also eine Herausforderung.

3. Performance
Ich habe keine Probleme mit sonstigen Rucklern oder Darstellungsproblemen. Das Spiel braucht keine allzu hohen Spezifikationen und ist auch auf einem 11 Jahre alten MacBook zu spielen ^^.

4. Preis / Leistung
Für derzeitig 8 Euro (7,99 | 20% reduziert) eine solch schöne und coole Grafik zu erhalten, lohnt sich meiner Meinung nach. Es existieren 7 Level, mit je 5-16 unterleveln, was man innerhalb von 20-25 Stunden denke ich mal durchgespielt hat. Da dieses Spiel erst gestern (5.12.2016) rausgekommen ist, kann man das denke ich dem Hersteller nicht übel nehmen. 

Fazit:
Ich bin absolut zufrieden mit diesem Spiel, und würde es jedem weiterempfehlen. Gerade jetzt, wo es einen Sale von 20 Prozent auf dieses Spiel gibt. Ich denke, es werden in den kommenden Wochen / Monaten noch einige Level-Updates kommen. Super Grafik und Performance, sowie sehr schöne Hintergrundmusik.

Ich hoffe, ich konnte den ein oder anderen Steam-Nutzer zum kauf anregen, und / oder ein paar offene Fragen klären.

Liebe Grüße,
Vincent

28187226.review:
Very good, but also very very very very extremely short for what it cost.
The puzzles are pretty solid, and solving some of the harder puzzles was genuine satisfying, which is exactly like a good puzzle should be.

I ran through all content without using clues in about 1 hour, then replayed a bit to get all the collection stuff. Had to do some RL stuff while I was playing, so the recorded 4 hours isn't "time played".

If you get this one on 50% off, sure go ahead. Otherwise, maybe wait and see if they release more content. It seems a bit too much to ask normal price for a game this short.

The game is a port from mobile platform, and as such the controls aren't usual PC controls. At first it is a bit clunky because no keyboard controls and you have to drag the mouse around, but I quickly found my way around that. After 10 minutes I didn't notice it much.

However, I can't recommend until there is more content (and no, payed DLC doesn't count).
10 EUR asking price isn't high, and the game is of reasonably good quality, but it really feels way too short.

Edit: I updated my review and changed it to recommend, because after you complete the main cmpaign, there is actually another adventure that I didn't see at first. This is a bit harder, and makes the game long enough to justify buying this game.

28183970.review:
오랜만에 클래식 라라를 볼 수 있어서 굉장히 반가웠습니다.

그리고 리뉴얼된 툼레이더에 라라처럼 적들이 있고 그들과의 살육전이 중심이 되는 것이 아니라 클래식 라라처럼 아무이유없이 고대의 던전에 들어가 몬스터들을 괴롭히며 보물을 훔쳐오는 것이 중심이 됩니다.

게임은 철저하게 퍼즐게임으로 한 번에 한칸씩만 이동이 가능하며, 그에 따라 함정과 적들의 반응과 턴 수를 역산하여 풀이를 하여 클리어하게  됩니다.

아 참고로 키마로는 움직이는 것도 좀 힘들고 패드로 하시는 편이 속편합니다. 

그마저도 이동이 대각방향이라 자꾸 원하는 방향으로 안가서 짜증을 불러일으킵니다.

총 플레이타임은 2~3시간정도입니다. 

그런데 마지막 보너스 스테이지인 불의동굴은 솔직히 얼마나 걸릴지 모르겠습니다. 

퍼알못인 제게는 굉장히 어렵더군요.

그래서 불의 동굴은 힌트를 꽤나 사용했습니다.
(사실상 힌트는 힌트라기보다는 해법서 수준! 그냥 답을 알려준다!)

아! 이 게임은 한글 미지원이라고 되있는주제에 전부 한글이 나옵니다!

비록 쓸데는 없었지만....



장점

1. 오랜만에 보는 폴리곤 라라
2. 나름대로 재미있는 퍼즐게임
3. 한글이다.
4. 더럽게 어려운 난이도의 퍼즐이 있다. (나같은 퍼알못을 위한 완벽한 해법서도 있다)


단점

1. 별다른 스토리가 없다.
2. 패드가 없으면 컨트롤이 힘들다.
3. 컬렉션요소가 있지만 역시나 별 의미가 없다. (복장을 원하지 않는다면 말이죠)

28182133.review:
This is an excellent, simple puzzle game. I love the minimalist aesthetics. I originally bought this game for my iPhone, then bought it again when it was released on the Windows store, and now bought it a third time on Steam. The Steam release removes the in app purchases (hints are now free) and also adds controller support, which is fantastic. 

The game distils the Tomb Raider format down to its essence: you'll play through a large number of small(ish) linear levels, where you will have to shoot wild animals, dodge others, and solve puzzles to reach the end and progress to the next level. The game is essentially turn-based, with enemies moving only when you make your move. You can also hunt around (using the right stick on the controller) for vases that contain items, which is great for your inner hunter-gatherer. 

It's a small game that you'll probably finish in a few hours or so, but it's a pleasant experience, with great visual design, and a few fun puzzles along the way. It's an excellent way to waste a few hours and I couldn't recommend it highly enough. I, for one, will play through the entire game yet again and am more than eager to do so.

39470881.review:
Lara Croft Go es el segundo y en mi opinión mejor juego de la trilogía Go.

Port directo del excelente juego para Smartphones de Square Enix Montreal, Lara Croft Go mezcla con gran maestría el encanto de la clásica saga Tomb Raider con las mecánicas de la serie Go, en un juego de puzzles por turnos que se siente como uno más de los míticos plataformas de Lara. El detalle del menú giratorio es simplemente encantador.

La dificultad está muy bien medida, aunque es cierto que atascarsenos algún puzzle en particular, en lineas generales se trata de un título bastante asequible.
Adicionalmente, trae gratuitamente las dos expansiones del móvil; la primera nos enfrenta a desafios más complejos, y la segunda nos premia con una excelente dirección artística.

Gráficamente sencillo pero soberbio, jugar en PC permite que el peculiar pero muy cuidado apartado gráfico sobresalga todavía más que en el móvil. Lara se mueve exactamente como en su saga madre, y os aseguro que algunas de sus animaciones os arrancarán una exclamación. Detalles y más detalles.

El único punto negativo que debo comentar es que al estar el original diseñado para el control táctil, puede resultar un poco extraño al principio controlar a Lara con mando, dada la perspectiva del juego. En todo caso, también se nos permite jugar con ratón, en una suerte de adaptación de los controles originales. 
Nada realmente preocupante, pero debía comentarlo.

En definitiva, Lara Croft Go es un gran juego, excelente en móvil/tablet y no menos excelente en PC, aún a pesar de la adaptación del control.
Si te gustan los juegos de puzzles, este es uno de los mejores.
